hr.fer.zemris.ml.training.decision_tree.split

Class SDReduction

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.ml.training.decision_tree.split.AbstractSplitCriterion<java.lang.Double>
      • hr.fer.zemris.ml.training.decision_tree.split.SDReduction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISplitCriterion<java.lang.Double>

    public class SDReduction
extends AbstractSplitCriterion<java.lang.Double>
    Chooses the best split based on standard deviation reduction. Usable for regression tasks.

    Splitting of samples stops when a predetermined percentage of training samples starting standard deviation is reached in current set of samples.

    Author:
    Dan
